User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://financebendigo.com.au/sitemap-index.xml

# Crawl-delay for politeness with search engines
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow private/admin areas if they exist
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /*.json$

# Allow important directories explicitly
Allow: /locations/
Allow: /services/
Allow: /blog/
